dataObject.content: The Democratic-led House backed Wednesday its first major gun-control legislation in years, but Republicans used the debate over it to try to put a focus on illegal immigration.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"It is biased, as it links Democrats to gun control and Republicans to illegal immigration."}

{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"The level of political involvement make it seem like some particular party deserves more blame than another. This is a clear instance of biased reporting."}
